snippet: There are many trials associated with enrolling in a cancer trial. Patients can fail to qualify, or later they can be thrown out or end up in a group that doesn’t get the drug. There are also challenges of geography and timing. But for some of us,...
abstract: There are many trials associated with enrolling in a cancer trial. Patients can fail to qualify, or later they can be thrown out or end up in a group that doesn’t get the drug. There are also challenges of geography and timing. But for some of us, a clinical trial is our best hope for living a little bit longer.

headline.main: Living With Cancer: The Trials of Cancer Trials
